mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by a lot of mods.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: API adding RPG style trinkets - rings, belts, amulets etc

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: Commons Codec
mod.description: Java library from Apache

mod.name: Commons Compress
mod.description: Java library from Apache

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: API for multipart blocks - covers, corner, nooks, pillars etc - as well as allowing multiple objects in the same block space

mod.name: ForgeRelocation
mod.description: Move blocks from one place to another

mod.name: RelocationFMP
mod.description: Adds FMP support to ForgeRelocation

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Library file for Project:Red

mod.name: ColorblindHelper
mod.description: Provides a way to add overlays to any item in the game, to assist with colorblindness in Minecraft.

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: NotEnoughKeys
mod.description: Upddated Version of Okushama's NotEnoughKeys. Sorts the Controls gui system and adds optional modifiers (SHIFT, CTRL, ALT) to keys.

mod.name: TC Node Tracker
mod.description: Tracks scanned nodes for Thaumcraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: NEI Integration for Thaumcraft 4.

mod.name: WAILA Harversability Addon
mod.description: Can I harvest what I'm looking at?

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Chicken Shed
mod.description: Chickens shed their feathers occasionally.

mod.name: Admin Commands Toolbox
mod.description: Adds a few useful commands for admins - setting world spawn and pre-generating chunks to reduce lag

mod.name: AgriCraft
mod.description: Agricultural farming extended

mod.name: Ancient Trees
mod.description: A Minecraft mod that adds many extinct tree species to the world.

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft

mod.name: Armourer's Workshop
mod.description: Minecraft armour customization mod.

mod.name: Automagy
mod.description: An addon for Thaumcraft 4 focused on providing flexible and interesting tools for automation and logistics, plus a few other fun thaumic gadgets.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power. Special thanks: powercrystals, skyboy, King_Lemming, & Calclavia for example code.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mod.name: Blood Magic
mod.description: Exploit the power of blood to reshape reality!

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Adds a variety of pipes and machines to make minecraft less... manual.

mod.name: Buildcraft Compat
mod.description: Compat mod for Buildcraft. Adds NEI recipes and other helpful gubbins.

mod.name: Builder's Guides
mod.description: Align All The Things!

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Catwalks Mod
mod.description: Fast travel with cool-looking catwalks!

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: Cooking for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a cooking book that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory.

mod.name: Dark Core
mod.description: Provides core functionality to darkcraft mods

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Lots and lots of props for all of your decorating needs! Seriously, theres a LOT!

mod.name: DummyCore
mod.description: API required to launch all mods made by DummyThinking Team

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Core mod for Ender IO.

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Ender IO Addons
mod.description: Additional machines for Ender IO.

mod.name: Ender Storage
mod.description: EnderStorage is a mod that offers a means to store your items in The END, causing them to be everywhere and nowhere at the same time. All EnderStorage makes use of the magic of colors to link storage with its little piece of The END. Any EnderStorage with the same color code share inventory (even across dimensions).

mod.name: EnderTech
mod.description: Ender themed technological expansion.

mod.name: Ender Utilities
mod.description: Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mod.name: Ewy's Workshop
mod.description: A fork of Steve's Workshop

mod.name: ExtraUtilities
mod.description: Originally a bunch of silly, random ideas... Now, awesomeness distilled into mod form!

mod.name: Farseek
mod.description: A Scala API for Minecraft mods.

mod.name: FastFlyBlockBreaking
mod.description: Allows to break blocks with normal speed when flying is enabled in survival mode.

mod.name: Finndus Fillies
mod.description: Provides horsemeat, cleverly disguised as beef. Also, glue (slime balls).

mod.name: Flat Signs
mod.description: Makes signs... flat!

mod.name: Forbidden Magic
mod.description: Forbidden Magic is an addon to add many dark-themed things to Thaumcraft.

mod.name: Garden Stuff
mod.description: Make your gardens and landscaping beautiful with multi-part plants, decorative planters, and more.

mod.name: Gear Swap
mod.description: Handy block to swap your gear

mod.name: Guide-API
mod.description: Simple mod guide creation.

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Backpacks
mod.description: Upgradeable backpacks!

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items.

mod.name: Iron Chest Minecarts
mod.description: Minecarts for all the chests added by Iron Chests!

mod.name: Kore Sample
mod.description: Kore Sample provides a set of tools and base classes for other Minecraft mods that depend on it.

mod.name: Liquid Dirt
mod.description: Dirt, thats also a liquid! Please, dirt responsibly.

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes,...

mod.name: Magical Crops: Core
mod.description: A Magical farming mod that allows you to grow and harvest all type of Minecraft resources, and make many magical items and armours. Also a massive thank you to the Painterly Pack team for giving me permission to use and edit some of there fantastic Minecraft textures!

mod.name: Magical Crops: Decorative
mod.description: Magical Crop addon, adds many decorative blocks to your world!

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mod.name: MekanismGenerators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: MekanismTools
mod.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mod.name: Minefactory Reloaded
mod.description: MFR aims to automate a number of tasks that previously would be difficult, boring, or work-intensive.

mod.name: MineTweaker3
mod.description: Tweak your minecraft with these easy to use scripts! Add recipes, remove recipes and more!

mod.name: Minions
mod.description: Now you too can be an EVIL MASTERMIND! Assemble your army of minions and go forth and take over the world!

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: Nether Ores
mod.description: Introduces mineable yet dangerous ores to the Nether

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: Not Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to NEI

mod.name: Not Enough Wands
mod.description: Wands, wands, and more wands

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: OpenMods Lib
mod.description: Boring stuff for all that silly Open* mods

mod.name: Open Peripherals Addons
mod.description: Random CC peripherals

mod.name: OpenPeripheral Core
mod.description: Converts many blocks into ComputerCraft peripherals!

mod.name: OpenPeripherals Integration
mod.description: Converts many blocks into ComputerCraft peripherals!

mod.name: Origin
mod.description: The core mod for all mods by CountryGamer

mod.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mod.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mod.name: Particle Library
mod.description: Library for some MrDimka's mods.

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Unlimited Fluid Transport

mod.name: ProjectE
mod.description: A complete rewrite of EE2 for modern Minecraft versions.

mod.name: Project:Red [Base]
mod.description: Project:Red Base Module

mod.name: Project:Red [Compat]
mod.description: Project:Red Compat module. Adds compatibility with other mods.

mod.name: Project:Red [Integration]
mod.description: Project:Red Integration module. Adds redstone circuits and other gubbins.

mod.name: Project:Red [Lighting]
mod.description: Project:Red Lighting module. Adds a heap of lights - blocks, fixtures, lamps etc

mod.name: Project:Red [World]
mod.description: Project:Red World module. Adds basalt and marble, as well as sweet volcanoes!

mod.name: Quick Crafting
mod.description: Craft without crafting.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random, magical things! And fast-decaying trees!

mod.name: Remain In Motion
mod.description: Moves blocks

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: Sanguimancy
mod.description: A Blood Magic addon adding all kind of stuff

mod.name: Simply Jetpacks
mod.description: Redstone Flux jetpacks and more

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Streams
mod.description: This mod introduces real flowing rivers, with a true current, to your Minecraft worlds. Compatible with many terrain generators!

mod.name: Tardis Mod
mod.description: A mod which adds functional TARDISes to minecraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Become a Thaumaturge of legend!

mod.name: Thaumic Bases
mod.description: Thaumic bases is a Thaumcraft 4 addon, which adds a whole bunch of random additions to Thaumcraft

mod.name: Thaumic Exploration
mod.description: An add-on for Thaumcraft 4.1, adding a variety of content.

mod.name: Thaumic Horizons
mod.description: Pushing the boundaries of magic

mod.name: Thaumic Infusion
mod.description: Allows alteration of the properties and purpose of a block through the use of Thaumcraft Aspects.

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT]. Build 24.

mod.name: Thermal Dynamics
mod.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: TrashSlot
mod.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mod.name: Traveller's Gear
mod.description: RPG Inventories! Armorstands! Cross-Mod Interaction! Woohoo!

mod.name: What Am I Looking At?
mod.description: Adds a handy GUI element that tells you what the block you're looking at is!

mod.name: WAILA Plugins
mod.description: WAILA plugins for various mods, such as Blood Magic, Magical Crops, and Forestry!

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with witchcraft.

mod.name: Witching Gadgets
mod.description: It's a kind of magic

mod.name: Minetweaker/Modtweaker Scripts
mod.description: Minetweaker/Modtweaker scripts.

mod.description: In-game guides for FTB Utils

mod.description: FTB Utils configs

mod.name: ProjectE Original Textures
mod.description: Original Project E textures

mod.name: No Rain, No Swirls Resource Pack
mod.description: Resource Pack to deal with that irritating rain stuff!

mod.name: Silent E
mod.description: Silent E removes the sounds from Project E tools when they are charged and discharged.
